articles.author: Michael Sainato
articles.title: Hollywood writers union mulls proposal from studios that would end strike - The Guardian
articles.description: Negotiating committee of Writers Guild of America says it is evaluating offer in substantial step forward
articles.content: Hollywood TV and film writers represented by the Writers Guild of America are evaluating a counterproposal from studios that would end their ongoing strike of more than 100 days, marking a substantia… [+1475 chars]
